attributes.action: Enure all new overtaking restrictions are properly investigated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Contracters working on road 'improvements' have control over where new Double-white lines are placed. Given the inconsistant and dangerous changes made on the A628 Woodhead Road over the Pennines, I suggest that changes to the law should not be placed in the hands of such un-elected people. I have seen a significant increase in journey times, together with far more people crossing these lines (including police cars). Motorcycles should feel most penalised.
